text: The peso is the money of Argentina. It has also been called the peso convertible. It is divided into 100 centavos. The number is written with a $ sign and then the number. In 2011, four pesos were equal to one United States dollar. In October 2014, eight pesos are equal to one United States dollar. ==References== ==Other websites== * Banknotes of Argentina Category:Currency of South America Category:Economy of Argentina Category:1826 establishments in South America Category:19th-century establishments in Argentina
title: Argentine peso
